name: The Rio that Slaves Knew
description: The travel today will be focused on knowing a little of slavery -era history in Brazil. The Rio de Janeiro for many years was the country's capital and one of the cities with the highest import of slaves from Africa . So today we have an experience at the center the Rio de Janeiro City where we will focus on where was the slave market and where was the stronghold of them during this time. But contrary to what one might think, the triip will not be focused on sorrow and grief , but in places where black culture was born and strengthened . We will have incredible views of the city and learn about some typical restaurants of cariocan food.And the most interesting thing is : NO NEED FOR TICKETS.You will only pay for what you eat or drink.
